page.title: 14Recreational activities
page.content: {Parish Rooms The Parish Rooms hold quite alot of activities for adults and young people.Brownies for young children and parties held for children up to 10 yrs.There are lots of adult activities Young Farmers Art Group Helping Hand Coffee Mornings {Sports Centre There are lots of different activities at the Sports Centre for young and old people. Squash Badminton Gymnastics Judo Karate Aerobics Circuit Training Aikido Keep Fit Ladies Netball Football Volleyball Racket-Ball There is also a Multi-Gym but this is not for children. {Civic centre} On Saturdays there is dancing and on another days gym and modern dance.
